IP Fabric | Network Engineering Customer Communicator | Prague, CZ | REMOTE

Who are we looking for

You're an experienced IP network engineer who likes to talk to the customers, and fellow network engineers. You're not afraid to work with Zendesk, road maps, twitter and LinkedIn.

Who we are

We develop next generation Intent-Based Network technology management platform. We're democratizing network infrastructure management, so engineers can manage technology, not vendors. We want all enterprises to have Google-like network.

Our offer

  * Equity through stock option plan
  * Flexible working hours
  * Equipment of your choice
  * Non open-space offices in the center of Prague with a lot of light (in case of onsite)
Email me at pavel@ipfabric.io
